message: Seriously, I could use some help
I mean, there are obvious things like having a free lite version
the guy from appcubby.com has written about his efforts
there's a lot of blog posts about marketing concepts other app developers have tried
it really depends of the kind of app you have
Have you tried the ad networks or facebook?
appcubby.com has very old blog entries, any other suggestions?
Again, what is the app? Find a blog that covers that topic, give away promo versions. You might get a couple reviews out of it.
@nickoneill already planned. just waiting for one more key feature to be added to our app so that the review will hopefully be stellar

I'm actually working on a product to help app developers promote their applications, in a roundabout way.  If you've built something that needs promotion, shoot me an email, and link the app -- I can maybe help.  bmelton@sympodial.com

If there are blogs that cover the kind of app you're working on send the writers an email, give them a few download codes for their staff to check out and review if they like it, and to possibly give away on the blog.
